snippet: Quality Egg has agreed to pay $6.8 million in fines for selling old eggs with false labels and the tainted products that caused a nationwide salmonella outbreak in 2010.
abstract: Quality Egg agrees to pay $6.8 million in fines for selling old eggs with false labels and the tainted products that caused nationwide salmonella outbreak in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Quality Egg has agreed to pay $6.8 million in fines for selling old eggs with false labels and the tainted products that caused a nationwide salmonella outbreak in 2010.

headline.main: Quality Egg to Pay Fine for Selling Tainted Eggs
headline.print_headline: Quality Egg to Pay Fine for Selling Tainted Eggs
